General.Name: Cubic Korea Inc
General.Description: Cubic Korea Inc. engages in cubic printing business in South Korea and internationally. The company develops printing patterns to plastic molded parts, aluminum, metal components, and urethane materials. It also engages in manufacturing, developing, and producing automobile exterior and interior parts, including radiator grilles, moldings, steering wheels, wheel caps, emblems, etc. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Ansan-si, South Korea.
